question: [Focus] Dansk: Angiv which integer bin occurs most frequently fra histogrammet.

qas.question: [Focus] Dansk: Angiv which integer bin occurs most frequently fra histogrammet.
[Review] Espanol: Di how many samples were used in total segun el histograma.
[Detailed] Francais: Indiquez how many entries fall inside the modal bin a partir de l'histogramme.
